## Data

The data used in this project was downloaded from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/house-prices-advanced-regression-techniques/overview/evaluation), a website that promotes data science education. It contains data of the price and house characteristics of residential homes in Ames, Iowa. The data was compiled by Dean De Cock for use in data science education. 

File descriptions:

* **data_description.txt** full description of each variable
* **train.csv** the training set
* **test.csv** the test set
